name: What’s So Cool About Fighting Games: Hyper Tag Fighting Expansion BETA
name_original: What’s So Cool About Fighting Games: Hyper Tag Fighting Expansion BETA
description:
An expansion module for the competitive RPGWhat's So Cool About Fighting Games.

This expanded edition brings the dynamic high energy battle of Hyper Fighting Games like Marvel vs Capcom, Guilty Gear, Blazblue, and Dragon Ball FighterZ to the table top world, with all new mechanics for Air Combos, New Super Attacks, and Tag Team Fighting.

This expansion is still in beta and will receive future updates adding brand new content and mechanics at no additional cost.
